name: estimator
description: Expectation value estimator. A runtime program that estimates the value of an observable for an input quantum circuit. This program is in beta mode and is only available to select accounts.

parameters.name: circuit
parameters.description: A parameterized or non-parameterized quantum circuit.

parameters.name: class_name
parameters.description: The name of the evaluator class.

parameters.name: measurement_error_mitigation
parameters.description: Whether to apply measurement error mitigation. Default is False.
